sub_topic: Show that every group of order 32 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C32, the dihedral group D16, or one of the six non-abelian groups of order 32.
message_1: Find all the possible isomorphism classes of groups of order 32, and for each class, identify one concrete example of a group in that class.
message_2:
To find all the possible isomorphism classes of groups of order 32, we will use the fact that 32 = 2^5. We will consider the number of factors of 2 in the group's order and the structure of the group.

1. Cyclic group of order 32: There is only one isomorphism class of cyclic groups of order 32. A concrete example of a group in this class is Z_32 (the integers modulo 32 under addition).

2. Direct product of two cyclic groups: There are two possibilities here: Z_16 x Z_2 and Z_8 x Z_4. These are distinct isomorphism classes, and they are not isomorphic to Z_32.

3. Direct product of three cyclic groups: There is only one possibility here: Z_8 x Z_2 x Z_2. This is not isomorphic to any of the previous groups.

4. Direct product of four cyclic groups: There is only one possibility here: Z_4 x Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2. This is not isomorphic to any of the previous groups.

5. Direct product of five cyclic groups: There is only one possibility here: Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2. This is not isomorphic to any of the previous groups.

6. Quaternion group of order 32: This group, denoted as Q_32, is a non-abelian group of order 32. It is not isomorphic to any of the previous groups.

7. Dihedral group of order 32: This group, denoted as D_32, is a non-abelian group of order 32. It is not isomorphic to any of the previous groups.

In total, we have found 7 isomorphism classes of groups of order 32:

1. Z_32
2. Z_16 x Z_2
3. Z_8 x Z_4
4. Z_8 x Z_2 x Z_2
5. Z_4 x Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2
6. Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2 x Z_2
7. Q_32
8. D_32
